fullgame.name: The Dawning Clocks of Time® Remake

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS / Ubuntu
  • Processor: Steam Deck Hardware / Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / NVIDIA GeForce / AMD Radeon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS / Ubuntu
  • Processor: Steam Deck Hardware / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / NVIDIA GeForce / AMD Radeon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Ventura or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Graphics or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro or Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Graphics or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: The Dawning Clocks of Time Remake Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 5 2.9GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RYZEN 5 7600X iGPU or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12650H 3.2GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
